data.title: Employment Opportunities
data.meta_description: Jobs at SCPRT range from park rangers, grant managers and fiscal analysts to public relations, tourism marketing and Information Technology professionals.
data.text:
Employment at the South Carolina Department of Parks, Recreation & Tourism

Discover a wide range of employment opportunities available with the South Carolina Department of Parks, Recreation & Tourism! We offer opportunities across all divisions of the agency including the State Park Service, SC Welcome Centers, State House Gift Shop & Tour Office, Sales & Marketing, Finance, Technology Services and many others.

- Job seekers can find all of our full-time careers posted online at SCPRT Careers!

- SCPRT also offers a variety of seasonal and part-time employment opportunities. For more information about the seasonal and part-time positions, click here!

Considering a Career in the State Park Service?

With State Parks in every corner of South Carolina, there are many career possibilities with the State Park Service. If you are considering a career with the State Park Service, check out the State Parks Career Opportunities page. This is a great resource that reviews the purpose of the Park Service and highlights key job areas.

Check out our Day in the Life of a Park Ranger series to learn more about these rewarding careers!

SCPRT Employee Benefits

The State of South Carolina has an excellent benefits package that adds significantly to the value of employment with SCPRT. The annual salary of a position is not the only factor to consider when looking for employment. See what else we have to offer below:

15 days annual leave each year (up to 45 unused days can roll over)

15 days of sick leave per year (up to 90 unused days can roll over)

Choose a retirement plan that’s right for you:

South Carolina Retirement System (Defined Benefit Plan) - or-

State Optional Retirement Program(Defined Contribution Plan)

Eligibility to participate in SC Deferred Compensation Program (401k or 457)

13 paid holidays per year

State Health Insurance

State Dental Insurance

State Vision Insurance

Long Term Disability Insurance

Life Insurance

MoneyPlus Flexible Benefits Program

Housing provided for select Park Service positions

Find out even more about the benefits offered to South Carolina State Government employees by visiting the Department of State Human Resources and the SC Public Employee Benefit Authority.

With all the great benefits included in your employment at SCPRT, it’s important to understand your total compensation: Annual Salary + Fringe Benefits.
